Sentencas: Gasification of municipal solid waste (MSW) with subsequent utilization of syngas in gas engines/turbines and solid oxide fuel cells can substantially increase the power generation of waste-to-energy facilities and optimize the utilization of wastes as a sustainable energy resources.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: However, purification of syngas to remove multiple impurities such as particulates, tar, HCl, alkali chlorides and sulfur species is required.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: This study investigates the feasibility of high temperature purification of syngas from MSW gasification with the focus on catalytic tar reforming and desulfurization.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Syngas produced from a downdraft fixed-bed gasifier is purified by a multi-stage system.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: The system comprises of a fluidized-bed catalytic tar reformer, a filter for particulates and a fixed-bed reactor for dechlorination and then desulfurization with overall downward cascading of the operating temperatures throughout the system.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Novel nano-structured nickel catalyst supported on alumina and regenerable Ni-Zn desulfurization sorbent loaded on honeycomb are synthesized.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Complementary sampling and analysis methods are applied to quantify the impurities and determine their distribution at different stages.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Experimental and thermodynamic modeling results are compared to determine the kinetic constraints in the integrated system.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: The hot purification system demonstrates up to 90% of tar and sulfur removal efficiency, increased total syngas yield (14%) and improved cold gas efficiency (12%).
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: The treated syngas is potentially applicable in gas engines/turbines and solid oxide fuel cells based on the dew points and concentration limits of the remaining tar compounds.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Reforming of raw syngas by nickel catalyst for over 20 h on stream shows strong resistance to deactivation.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste

Sentencas: Desulfurization of syngas from MSW gasification containing significantly higher proportion of carbonyl sulfide than hydrogen sulfide, traces of tar and hydrogen chloride demonstrates high performance of Ni-Zn sorbents.
Titulo: A hot syngas purification system integrated with downdraft gasification of municipal solid waste
